nodes.text: The Malastarian Art Union was an organization dedicated to art, operating on Malastare as of 32 BBY. The Art Union posted a bounty for Guanolta, a member of Sebolto's drug cartel. They wanted him both for mixing several sets of rare paint in a public art display and the sale of death sticks to the young of Pixelito. Jango Fett claimed the bounty alive for them.
